Drug: hepatitis a adult vaccine / hepatitis b adult vaccine
Oral Antibiotics (Doxycycline, Minocycline for severe cases
Multivitamin Supplement (including vitamin A and zinc)
Azithromycin (1g single dose for adults, 20mg/kg for children)
Tetracycline eye ointment (1% twice daily for 6 weeks)
Surgical Intervention: For trichiasis or scarring
Surgical Removal or Laser Therapy (for persistent warts)
Topical Interferon (for severe or resistant cases)
